com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api

Enum RS232Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RS232Configuration>
      • com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.RS232Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfiguration, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RS232Configuration>

    public enum RS232Configuration
extends java.lang.Enum<RS232Configuration>
implements IConfiguration
    RS-232 states, events and errors as defined in the RS-232 Spec.

    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Cory Todd

      processing.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static final RS232Configuration INSTANCE
        Instance is singleton of RS232Configuration. This contains
        all state, event, and error information pertaining to the attached slave.

      • getEventMask

        public int getEventMask()
        Specified by:
        getEventMask in interface IConfiguration
        Returns:
        the current event mask

      • getEnableMask

        public int getEnableMask()
        Returns:
        the current mask used for enabling or disabling acceptance
        of notes.

      • setEventMask

        public void setEventMask(int mask)
        Events are the foundation of the PTalk, event driven API. As a client,
        you are able to select which events (interface dependent) you want
        notification for. The mask is a bitwise integer where 1 indicates active and indicates
        inactive.
        Specified by:
        setEventMask in interface IConfiguration

      • setEnableMask

        public void setEnableMask(int mask)
        Serial Protocol often allow for the enable/disable of bills or other
        features via a bit mask. This implementation supports an integer mask
        where 1 indicates the feature is enabled and 0 indicates that it is
        disabled.
        Specified by:
        setEnableMask in interface IConfiguration

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable the slave device if the protocol supports it.
        Specified by:
        setEnabled in interface IConfiguration
        Parameters:
        enable - true will enable the device, false will disable

      • getEnabled

        public boolean getEnabled()
        Specified by:
        getEnabled in interface IConfiguration
        Returns:
        true if the device is enabled, otherwise false
